titlealts.searchtitle: Supporting Information: Data Processing Services - Description

div.p: The Data Processing Services (DPS) is a secure, highly-scalable system that transforms the way data is used to improve health and care.

The Data Processing Services enables more efficient data collection, processing and distribution and delivers a clearer picture of health and care by providing more timely access to better linked, anonymised data.
For further information on the Data Processing Services, see the NHS Digital website at: Improving our Data Processing Services (DPS).
